title: Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Fabrication and Supply of School Desks at Plan International
description:
Plan International is an independent development and humanitarian non-profit organization that advances children’s rights and equality for girls. We support children’s rights from birth until they reach adulthood and enable children to prepare for – and respond to – crises and adversity. We believe in the power and potential of every child but know this is often suppressed by poverty, violence, exclusion and discrimination.

Working together with children, young people, supporters and partners, we strive for a just world, tackling the root causes of the challenges girls and vulnerable children face. We have been building powerful partnerships for children for over 80 years and are now active in more than 70 countries, driving changes in practice and policy at local, national and global levels using our reach, experience and knowledge. Plan International is registered in Nigeria with the Corporate Affairs Commission.
keyResponsibilities: Plan International is committed to obtaining fair value for services rendered with a competitive price and timely delivery of the right quantities at the right quality. This RFP intends to secure a competitive proposal for the fabrication and supply of School Desks to Damboa and Mobbar LGAs in Borno State.
requiredSkills: Bids submitted after the deadline date will NOT be accepted. Questions must be sent by email to: TenderInquiry@plan-international.org with the bid reference in the subject. A detailed description of the Request for Proposal can be accessed via this link: CLICK HERE Disclaimer: Plan International does not charge bidders fees for submitting this tender or ask for any form of registration to access our information.
applicationMethod: Interested and qualified Vendors should submit sealed bids addressed to: Plan International Nigeria Attention: Head of Supply Chain No 49, Anthony Enahoro Street, Utako District, Abuja, Nigeria.  Bids can also be submitted in soft copies to: Nigeria.procurement@plan-international.org using this reference, "PIN/CO/025/011’ “ECHO School Desks" as the subject of the mail.

keyResponsibilities: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. title: Cybersecurity Training & Internship Program at Refonte Learning
description: Refonte Learning is an Ed-Tech powerhouse under Refonte Private Limited, offering comprehensive IT training programs. The unique Global Training & Internship Program combines industry-relevant training with real-world project work alongside experienced professionals.
keyResponsibilities: As a cybersecurity intern, you will be involved in various key activities, including: Vulnerability Analysis & Penetration Testing (Pentesting):  Identify and assess security vulnerabilities in systems and applications. Conduct vulnerability scans and penetration tests (black-box, white-box, grey-box). Prepare security reports and recommendations for mitigation. Infrastructure Security & Incident Management:  Monitor networks and systems for suspicious activities. Analyze security incidents and assist in threat response. Contribute to the implementation and hardening of security policies. Application Security & Secure Development (DevSecOps):  Analyze code for vulnerabilities in web and mobile applications. Integrate security best practices into the software development lifecycle (CI/CD). Automate security testing using scripts and specialized tools. Compliance & Regulatory Standards:  Study and apply cybersecurity standards and frameworks (ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, etc.). Assist in drafting security policies and procedures. Participate in internal and external security audits. Research & Awareness Initiatives:  Stay up to date with emerging threats, malware, and attack techniques. Develop training materials and awareness programs on cybersecurity. Take part in cybersecurity conferences and challenges (CTF, Hackathons).
requiredSkills: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity, Networks, or a related field. Desired Profile:  We are looking for passionate, curious, and motivated individuals eager to learn in a fast-paced cybersecurity environment. Technical Skills:  Cybersecurity fundamentals: network security, cryptography, identity & access management. Programming/Scripting knowledge: Python, Bash, PowerShell, JavaScript, etc. Operating systems expertise: Windows, Linux, and system hardening techniques. Cybersecurity tools: Wireshark, Metasploit, Burp Suite, Nmap, Snort, Nessus, etc. Network security & protocols: TCP/IP, VPN, Firewalls, IDS/IPS. Understanding of penetration testing methodologies (OWASP, MITRE ATT&CK). Soft Skills:  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Attention to detail, autonomy, and ability to handle security incidents under pressure. Excellent communication and ability to explain technical concepts clearly. Strong teamwork and adaptability to new technologies.
applicationMethod: Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: murielle@refontelearning.co using the Job Title as the subject of the email.
